articles.content: Who has the opportunity to commit violent crime these days anyway?, asks Alice. The moment you pick up a fruit knife you get tasered by a robot policeman and deported for looking Bulgarian. Its a muc… [+4141 chars]

articles.title: Apple Introduces "One More Thing" Event - IT News Africa
articles.description: Apple has announced that its gearing up for the “One More Thing” event on Tuesday, 10 November. The tech giant is expected to showcase the first Arm-based Macs that run on Apple Silicon chips instead of the Intel processors, according to The Verge. Rumours al…
